name: Age of Tanks 5: Men of Iron
name_original: Age of Tanks 5: Men of Iron
description:
My 1st year university project, originally written in C, but finally made available to the public with the help of emscripten! The inner structure had to be badly butchered to work with emcc, but the iconic gameplay remains the same.

Sprites : https://opengameart.org/

Logo & design : Danila Gerasimov

===============

Gameplay :

  • Arrows : move
  • Space : shoot

Destroy five ships in a row without dying to win the game!

================
